sections.title: Who Am I?
sections.content: I am a software development enthusiast, always looking to create innovative solutions for practical situations. I have worked on the development of web and mobile applications, participating in all phases of the project, from planning to implementation. I am interested in the entire software development process, ensuring that applications not only solve problems but also provide an excellent user experience.

sections.title: How Do I Work?
sections.content: I value teamwork and believe that communication and commitment are essential for success. I enjoy collaborating with other developers and receiving feedback to continuously improve. In my free time, I enjoy listening to music and exploring new technologies through videos and tutorials.

content.textMiddle: , is an acronym that pays homage to my beloved pets,

items.title: Development Tools
items.content: VSCode, Netbeans, IntelliJ IDEA, Android Studio, Project IDX

items.title: Other Tools
items.content: Microsoft Project, Bizagi, Git, GitHub, Jira, Notion

footer.message: Thank you for visiting my portfolio. I hope you find my projects interesting and useful.
